nodes.text: In 5 ABY, a conflict over agriworlds was fought by the New Republic three sectors away from the Cerberon system. During the battle, the New Republic won supply ships which were later sent to supply the planet Troithe with resources. After the campaign in the Cerberon system, Republic General Hera Syndulla discussed the battle for at least two nights in a holographic conference with New Republic High Command.
